lines.text: [Randy desperately has to go to the bathroom]

[whining]
Mom, I can't undo my knot; I have to go!
Ralph, would you help your brother?
For crying out loud! OK, runt, let's go!

[in a high pitched voice]
Boys! Come on, breakfast is ready!
[the family just stopped for Ralph's mother to look at house rugs]

[to himself]
Just once, I'd like to get to Ollie's before dark. Just once!

[the family is finishing loading the car]
OK, we have the box of canned goods... did you get the bath mat?
A bath mat? What do we need a bath mat for?
Well, you never know! It might be nice.

lines.character: Grannie of Grannie's Old Log Cabins

lines.text: Isn't that clever? The wind does that!
What are you doing? We don't have time to look at any dumb hooked rugs! We're trying to make it to Ollie's before dark!
